name: Live to Work, Work to Live
name_original: Live to Work, Work to Live
description:
It's a Ludum Dare 44 project -> https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/live-to-work-work-to-live

theme: Your Life is Currency

This an office themed capitalist survival mini game based game. Your goal is to survive as many days as you can by doing your job that the nice guy in the office will politely ask you to do. Your job consists of completing with a certain score office themed mini games located in different computers across the room. If you don’t complete them by the end of the day, you will get fired and will lose the game automatically.
At the end of each successful day you will get a payment and will have bills to pay, some of them can be postponed, with the condition of getting a negative side effect.
